sentences.en: About this time Don Tommasino seemed to be preoccupied and poor company.
sentences.cn: 这个时候,托马辛诺老头子似乎忙得不可开支,很少陪他们.

sentences.en: At nightfall, he returned to the rickshaw yard dead - beat and preoccupied.
sentences.cn: 晚上, 他回到车厂,身上已极疲乏,但是还不肯忘了这件事.

sentences.en: He saw that she was preoccupied, and forbore to question her.
sentences.cn: 他看出来她心里有事, 也就没问她什么话.

sentences.en: He was too preoccupied with his own thoughts to notice anything wrong.
sentences.cn: 他只顾想着心事，没注意到有什么不对。

sentences.en: His mind is preoccupied with private cares.
She seemed preoccupied all the time I was talking to her.
sentences.cn: 我跟她讲话时她始终显得心事重重.

sentences.en: The conservatives were not preoccupied uniquely with economic affairs or growth.
sentences.cn: 保守派并非仅仅优先考虑经济事务或经济增长.

sentences.en: The painter was silent and preoccupied , there was a gloom over him.
sentences.cn: 画家一声不吭,心事重重, 整个人都显得阴沉沉的.

sentences.en: The question of going to the Mount Tai preoccupied his mind.
sentences.cn: 去游泰山的问题盘踞在他心头.

sentences.en: Very preoccupied , he got into his train, mislaid his ticket.
sentences.cn: 上火车时,他又是心不在焉, 连车票都差点儿找不到.

sentences.en: What’s wrong with Cindy? She seems a little preoccupied.
sentences.cn: 辛迪怎么了？她好像有点心事重重。

sentences.en: While so preoccupied, he forgot his usual cautiousness.
sentences.cn: 在这么乱想的时候, 他忘了素日的谨慎.

sentences.en: You are very much preoccupied, you are thinking of something.
sentences.cn: 你现在简直是一副丧魂落魄的样子, 你是在想什么心事.

sentences.en: You look preoccupied: what are you thinking of?
sentences.cn: 看你心不在焉,在想什么?

words.tran_cn: 先入为主；全神贯注；极为忙碌（等于preoccupation）
全神贯注，入神；当务之急；关注的事物；抢先占据；成见
全神贯注的；心事重重的；被先占的

trans.tran_cn: 全神贯注的，入神的，被抢先占有的，心事重重的
trans.tran_en: thinking about something a lot, with the result that you do not pay attention to other things

trans.tran_cn: 占据（某人）思想，使对…全神贯注，使专心于( preoccupy的过去式)
